exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros H12 Hl1 Hl2. destruct Hl1 as [Hl1_upper Hl1_le]. destruct Hl2 as [Hl2_upper Hl2_le]. apply Rbar_is_lub_subset with (E1 := E1) (E2 := E2) in Hl1. - apply Rbar_is_lub_subset with (E1 := E2) (E2 := E1) in Hl2. ++ eapply Rbar_lb_eq_ub. ** apply Hl1. ** apply Hl2. ** intros x Ex. split. --- intros. apply Hl1_upper. apply H12. auto. --- intros. apply Hl2_upper. apply H12. auto. ++ intros x Ex. apply H12. auto. - intros x Ex. apply H12. auto.
